task.title: Save Table as CSV
task.shortdesc: Save the table visible in the Results window as a CSV file.

step.stepresult: A browse window will appear, prompting you to choose a file name and directory in which to save the table.

step.cmd: Choose a file name and directory for your table and click Save.
step.stepresult: The table in the Results window will be saved as a CSV file in the chosen directory.If excluded records are currently visible, they will be included in the CSV file.
